text: NEW YORK ( TODAY ) - Cue up the saxophone, order a pizza and get ready to celebrate! As if we weren't excited enough about ABC's ` ` Roseanne'' revival, here's more good news : Johnny Galecki, who played Darlene Conner's boyfriend David Healy in the original series, will reprise the role in 2018. Up until now, it was unconfirmed that Galecki would return to the show â€” especially given his starring role on the CBS comedy series ` ` The Big Bang Theory.'' But as Galecki explained in an Instagram post, his ` ` Big Bang'' colleagues understood the draw to his TV sitcom roots. 21 YEARS LATER...! Apart from being born, possibly the most surreal
